card.name: CW - CCW273 - Paid up Letter enhancement

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer  @neilbosworth @cobuspienaar 

From the Investigation thus far i can pick up that i always check for the below reasons to validate on Rescission Reasons:

'Abandonment',
'Rehabilitation',
'Rescission',
'Rescission of Admin Order',
'Withdrawal'


I would just need to add the new Rescission Reason to the above list across the board.
